fr.pinguet62.jsfring.gui.util

Class OrderConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.pinguet62.jsfring.gui.util.OrderConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<org.primefaces.model.SortOrder,Function<com.mysema.query.types.expr.ComparableExpressionBase<?>,com.mysema.query.types.OrderSpecifier<?>>>

    public final class OrderConverter
extends Object
implements Function<org.primefaces.model.SortOrder,Function<com.mysema.query.types.expr.ComparableExpressionBase<?>,com.mysema.query.types.OrderSpecifier<?>>>
    Convert the property and the SortOrder of an EntityPathBase to the OrderSpecifier to apply.

    Ordered field must be a ComparableExpressionBase.

      • apply

        public Function<com.mysema.query.types.expr.ComparableExpressionBase<?>,com.mysema.query.types.OrderSpecifier<?>> apply(org.primefaces.model.SortOrder order)
        Apply the order: get the OrderSpecifier.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface Function<org.primefaces.model.SortOrder,Function<com.mysema.query.types.expr.ComparableExpressionBase<?>,com.mysema.query.types.OrderSpecifier<?>>>
        Parameters:
        order - The SortOrder (from PrimeFaces).
        Returns:
        The OrderSpecifier.
        null if the order is SortOrder.UNSORTED.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If property or order is null.
        ClassCastException - The target field is not a ComparableExpressionBase, so doen't support filter.
        See Also:
        Transform property name to {@link SimpleExpression} .
